#linux #networking 

location: *~/.ssh/authorized_keys*
Here are added the public keys of authorized hosts. This allows these hosts to log in without password.
example file:
```
ssh-rsa  vitaly@vitaly-Precision-3561
ssh-rsa  tamirf@tamirf-ThinkPad-T14-Gen-1
ecdsa-sha2-nistp256 AAAAE2VjZHNhLXNoYTItbmlzdHAyNTYAAAAIbmlzdHAyNTYAAABBBG+N/O3kEJ8poLlm9QBbexvfNZML0wn3e/52/mkvkDPDeF5dKYf5Idq6JvLaG8oqOPD8uETgRyjRM1VMgD5aqxk= alon@raven
ssh-rsa  ava@ava-ubun-3561
```
